alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:52PM CDT until August 14 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1152 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Forsyth, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, Hollister, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Rockaway Beach, Taneyville, Kirbyville, Powersite, Rueter, Ozark Beach, Edgewater Beach and Walnut Shade. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
